channel.title: WordPress – First Time Flowing
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: RSS Feed Readers
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: It looks like the default RSS feed from my site does not include images. So if you read this via a feed reader, you won’t be able to see the Dream Job webcomic (or any other images or photos). I’ll see if there is some kind of plugin I can use to remedy that.
item.content:encoded: It looks like the default RSS feed from my site does not include images. So if you read this via a feed reader, you won’t be able to see the Dream Job webcomic (or any other images or photos). I’ll see if there is some kind of plugin I can use to remedy that.

item.title: New Year, New Look
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: As you can see, I’ve changed the look of the site with this nifty foliage theme created by 5thirtyone.com. I still need to find a good place to put the archives and perhaps an index of all the tags.
item.content:encoded: As you can see, I’ve changed the look of the site with this nifty foliage theme created by 5thirtyone.com. I still need to find a good place to put the archives and perhaps an index of all the tags.

item.title: October Retroblog
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I’m on a roll tonight! I think October is all up to date now. Plus I added a few things to early November. 22 new posts tonight, total. Daaayumm!
item.content:encoded:
I’m on a roll tonight! I think October is all up to date now.

Plus I added a few things to early November.

22 new posts tonight, total. Daaayumm!

item.title: September Retroblog up
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: To make up for my lack of recent posts, I went back and retroblogged September, filling in some of the gaps about things that happened then. So go check out the September archives and maybe you’ll see something new!
item.content:encoded: To make up for my lack of recent posts, I went back and retroblogged September, filling in some of the gaps about things that happened then. So go check out the September archives and maybe you’ll see something new!

item.title: So…
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Okay, so the blog is back up. I have an idea about what I want to do with this space, but I won’t be able to explore it for a while. I cannot promise any sort of regular updates. You know how I roll by now.
item.content:encoded: Okay, so the blog is back up. I have an idea about what I want to do with this space, but I won’t be able to explore it for a while. I cannot promise any sort of regular updates. You know how I roll by now.

item.title: Transition Complete
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I’ve moved all the posts and comments from Blogger over to this new WordPress blog. I lost a lot of the images, though. As I come across them, I will try to replace them.
item.content:encoded: I’ve moved all the posts and comments from Blogger over to this new WordPress blog. I lost a lot of the images, though. As I come across them, I will try to replace them.

item.title: Gestalt
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Maybe if I put it all in one place, it will start to come together and mean something. I guess I’m now “retro blogging.” Remember: you heard that term here first!
item.content:encoded:
Maybe if I put it all in one place, it will start to come together and mean something.

I guess I’m now “retro blogging.” Remember: you heard that term here first!

item.title: RSS Feed now fixed
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: The site feed was not updating properly, but that is fixed now.
item.content:encoded: The site feed was not updating properly, but that is fixed now.
